content.rendered:
Directed By C. Ashwini Dutt. Swapna Dutt

Written By Hanu Raghavapudi . Jay Krishna . Raj Kumar Kandamudi . Rutham Samar . Raj Kumar Kandamudi

Stars Dulquer Salmaan (Lt. Ram). Mrunal Thakur (Sita Mahalakshmi / Princess Noor Jahan). Rashmika Mandanna (Afreen). Sumanth (Vishnu Sharma). Bhoomika Chawla (Vaidehi Sharma). Abhinaya (Noor Jahan’s sister-in-law). Tharun Bhascker Dhaassyam (Balaji). Tinnu Anand (Anand Mehta). Gautham Vasudev Menon (Major Selvan). Ananth (Seetaramaiah). Vennela Kishore (Durjaya Sharma). Pawan Chopra (Pakistani General Muhammed Musa Khan). Murli Sharma (Subramaniam). Keshav Deepak (Hyderabad Army Officer). Prakash Raj (Brigadier Y.K. Joshi). Hriju Dhibar (Army Friend). Jay Jha (Akram). Neeraj Kabi (Pakistan Lawyer). Rajkumar Kasireddy. Sachin Khedekar (Abu Tariq). Rukmini Vijay Kumar (Rekha Bharadwaj( Noor Jahan’s Friend)). Anish Kuruvilla (Nizam Advisor). Shahid Malik (Pakistani Militant). Praneeta Patnaik (Radhika). Priyadarshi (Marthandam). Sandeep Raj. Rahul Ravindran (Rahul Varma). Rohini (AIR Reporter). Sathviksriram (Sathvik). Shatru (Vikas Varma). Jisshu Sengupta (Akbar(Noor Jahan’s Brother)). Sunil (Ticket Collector)

Language Hindi. Telugu

Producers C. Ashwini Dutt. Swapna Dutt

Production Vyjayanthi Movies. Swapna Cinema
